name: Ganesh kamath
title: It is 100% Original
text: Guys, there are two ways to find out the authenticity of this product. First,  scratch the hologram which reveals 8 digit code. Enter this code in Bright commodities website which will confirm it's authenticity. If you are still not convinced then call Glanbia (manufacturer) on 011 49594959 and tell them your batch code. They will confirm it's authenticity.!!!

I had contemplated using the "Subscribe and Save" to get some discounts, but when they have no assurance on age of the product, it is pointless.Background: I ordered in Jan 2021 and got a product manufactured in June 2019. The expiry date for the box is June 2021. I did not check it prior to opening. Also it does not taste good (not like the previous ones I have had). It probably was not stored right as the TASTE HAS GONE BAD. Will not buy this ever again from Amazon.The authentication sticker validates the box - But the box itself is not tamperproof and the seal is more like a heat-shrink seal. Not sure it is authentic.

Bright commodities said its genuine product when i sent scratch code but its mixability is really bad, not even mixing with shaker and taste is less chocolaty,i dnt feel any heavyness in stomach after having it. Noticed few changes in packaging. It clearly says FOR EXPORT ONLY and they are printing India's FSSAI green mark on label in USA. Feels like its substandard product. Manufacturing exclusively for people of India. I dnt know whats wrong but its definitely not On's Gold standard Whey that we had earlier. Discarding it and switching to Rule 1 or wild whey

name: Khagendra
title: Read It
text: Brand is famous and doesn't need any review however it is bit costly because of it's popularity.Take it but with safety.1. Never take more than necessary protein because excess protein can damage kidney. Yes we believe if we take extra, we will be stronger however it has side effects and shoud be consumed in safe limit.2. When you take protein you must drink minimum 3 litres of water. Again drinking excess water helps kidney to flush out excess urea and also excess unconsumed protein.3. When you don't excercise, don't take it. Many guys keep consuming it even after they don't go to gym or workout. Don't take it as a health nutrition.4. When you visit any gym, the gym trainer try to brainwash you to buy protein powder. Never listen to the gym guy because he gets commision to sell protein powder. If you really need, get one. Also don't buy the brand suggested by gym trainer. To get high commission they suggest you any other brand and they don't care about your health. They just care about their commision.Thanks for reading. Cheers!

name: Shrinivas
title: Authentic and Best Product
text: The product I received is Authentic and Tastes so good.Many People are confused on how to check the Authenticity of this product and that's why I'm writing this review to help you out. Following are the things you need to check and that determines the authenticity.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------1. The Seal. ON has it's black seal with golden ON hologram on it. It's the part of plastic and isn't any sticker.2. The Spelling mistake. ISOLATE & ISOLATES both are AUTHENTIC. ISOLATE is from USA & ISOLATES is from UK.3. The Bright Commodities Sticker and Scratch code which you can check by visiting their website.4. The BOX doesn't come with INNER SEAL. If you don't find SEAL INSIDE THEN IT IS AUTHENTIC.5. The INSIDE of the CAP. It has MADE IN USA written on it.6. The ON LOGO on the SCOOP. If the SCOOP HAS ON LOGO then it's AUTHENTIC.7. The MFD on the tub which will be TWO YEARS DIFFERENCE and WHEN SCRATCHED, IT GOES.8. The MIXABILITY of the powder, IT WILL GET MIXED VERY EASILY IN 30 SECONDS.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------IF you get all the above things right then your product is AUTHENTIC.The product is really good and i could see the RESULTS FROM DAY ONE itself and it TASTES GOOD but the taste stays in your mouth for a while. I just use a glass and a spoon to mix and it MIXES IN 30 SECONDS leaving NO LUMPS.It FEELS LIGHT and DOESN'T BLOAT. MUSCLE RECOVERY is really quick.If you are LACTOSE INTOLERANT then YOU SHOULD BUY IT because IT DOESN'T HARM YOU.MUSCLE BLAZE WHEY GAVE ME PIMPLES BUY ON WHEY DIDN'T GIVE ME ANY PIMPLES.Go for it and you won't regret.Happy Lifting

text: I am frequent buyer of this product when Iam in overseas .I ordered the same from INDIA.I would recommend - PLEASE STAY AWAY FROM ORDERING HEALTH DRINKS FROM ONLINE1) There is a Authentication process of this product, but the whole process is fake, because the health drink company does endorse the company which authenticates2) The Importers of this products is also not being endorsed by the original manufacture3) AMAZON will not take accountability on the genuinity of this product by stating there are Just a sale platform.4) The Avg rating in the website for the Overall Products and not separately sold in INDIA,so don?? go by it.Note: Even today I am a frequent buyer from Amazon, but I decided not to touch any food product from these online sources.

name: akshay kumar
title: Genuine product
text: Brought this product through the seller cloudtail. I checked through few ways and found it to be a genuine product.How to identify:1. Check if there is a hologram (golden colour) at the cap2. Look for the manufacturing details and batch code at the bottom of the bottle . It should be in blue colour . The manufacturing date should be of a difference of 2 years exactly .3. Check for any spelling mistakes4. Scan the QR code and make sure it leads to their original site .5. Inside the bottle , there will be a scoop and it should be in golden colour with the ON logo .6. The powder should be very light like a talcum powder .Hope this gives you a better idea to check whether it?? genuine .Thank you cloudtail for delivering it in one day and I hope this whey protein gives me a good result .

name: sandeep
title: Genuine product
text: I bought it from cloudtail india and its a genuine product. I have used it twice and it is good for fulfilling the protein content required by your body. I will recommend to those who are doing workout, gyming or exercises and require high protein content for muscle building. If you can complete your required protein content by food like eggs, chicken breasts, etc then there is no need of this protein powder. Therefore don?? buy it blindly, firstly do analyse your body protein needs, workout goals and daily protein intake you are getting currently then go for it. No issues with the product and the brand as it is 100% genuine of Optimum Nutrition.

name: Anurag
title: Good Quality Whey Protein
text: I purchased this product multiple times. Tast is ok for me. I check the authenticity code and packing after doing all the outer inspection its time to check the inside stuff. As we all know pure protein is not heat soluble so I would take some water in a cup put 1 to 2 teaspoon of the whey protein powder mix it and put it in the microwave for 2 mins. After two mins you will find the powder has turned into solid in indian language it will be like (fata hua dudh). We are set and ready to use the product tension free and focus on working out and putting extra effort.

name: Antra Maurya
title: Changes in Authenticity check
text: So I watched a lot of YouTube videos regarding ON authenticity.My product did not have an importer tag also there was no blue expiry date on the bottom.So I called ON customer support and the agent mentioned below points-1. Glanbia (importer) now imports raw material from US and packaging is done in India. I guess the plant is in Himachal and established some 6 months back.2. There will be no importer tag in new ON boxes.3. Expiry date and batch number is now printed on back of the box in a white space with black ink and not on the bottom.4.No vaccum cover on the lid intead a pasted seal.5. Check authenticity by the TRU SEAL (which we all do).

title: Good Product!
text: As the headline says, i am not sure about the effect of this product on my body. This is my third box of ON protein shake and also i am pretty regular to the GYM since last 8-9 months. But frankly speaking, i do not see major improvements in my physique. I weigh around 74 kgs. I think i need to use it for couple years then i will be able to see some muscle growth. But this product is good. I like the taste and so far i have not had any issue with my digestive system (touchwood).  I will write another review once i see some muscle growth.

I did a little R&D thru YouTube about genuine product .I took my box again after a year and notice that a white MRP and discount sticker put in the place of bright commodities scratch code . I peeled that  sticker and notice the scratch card and  tried to scratch it . The "scratch here" was a hologram sticker and despite scratching, it didn't show any code . Please see the pic attached . The product expiry of my box is 08/19 and I still have half of the powder left.Amazon should really consider monitoring the fake products and consider the issue seriously and take action sellers. They are playing with health.

name: Nitish Negi
title: A very well presented FAKE powder
text: Well this is a very well done FAKE product.Now you guys must be wondering that how am I this sure about the quality of the product.So here it goes.I have been consuming this product from the last 1 year. And every time I have asked my known ones to get it from any GNC store in USA.So from the beginning I have consumed the genuine product.And now comes the interesting part. Why I am sure that this product is not Genuine.So the one I ordered from here was sweet like a chocolate powder that is used to make chocolate shake. The original GNC one I ordered was not sweet at all. It tasted all bland. Moreover the Sugar Content in the ingredients of the packing is 1gram per serving. Low enough that you just won't taste it. Just as in case of the GNC one.Also, when I first opened the jar, there were a hell lot of white particles all around the powder that were not mixed. I never saw anything like this in my previous protein of same make and type.Checkout the image I have attached.Another one was the powder seemed to be as if moisture has had its effect on it. The one I consumed from GNC was just like "Maida" with not moisture.Now at last, this is a very well presented fake product.Think I am just defaming it? Go ahead! Buy it.I don't care if you still want to have it.But would love to at least speak it out and help someone who isn't aware of such things.Peace!EDIT: Tried placing a replacement order just to see if I accidentally received the fake one. But to my surprise, it was 'MORE FAKE' than the previous one. This time, not only the powder but the whole packaging was copied and was fake. There was "S" missing in the "ISOLATES" in from on the box. Also, there was a difference in the design of the label.Have placed a return now.

name: Swapnil
title: Amazon Be ready for my next order in next month ;)
text: Thank you very much,Cloudtail for selling productAmazon for making it available and good customer support "When I contact them for asking what if I get a fake product what will happen they said it's not eligible for return but if I received fake they will provide full support to me"But at the end I received genuine product: )Just I have one question (which I asked in question section so please answer it)Double chocolate taste like a little bit medicine like sweetner not like natural sweet sugar may be that's because there is artificial sugar in product: :) don't know 1st time buying it.I done following checks:-1.Container shape2.Dhakan shining :D3.spelling mistakesImportant: -4.Golden seal on neck5.Barcode on tub leading to Optimum nutrition site6.Barcode on "bright commodities" sticker leading to authentication process7.Scratching on "Bright commodities" sticker to get a code to put on official "Bright commodities" site for authentication8.Hole if someone try to remove original power and replace it with fakeFollowing things final things telling you quality of product: -9.Smell10.Mixing with water (yes if you kept it still particles at top will try to come together)And do mixing in glass mug so that you can see if particles are settling down (doesn't settle in case of original when check after 7-8 sec)11. Doesn't taste exactly like natural sugar sweet but something similar to sweetners.May be I put a lot of waterSo yeah thats all.Edit:- Ordered 2nd time :)This time I did a replacement because I was not satisfied with the quality of my first order and Amazon was really helpful in that.Amazon Be ready for my next order in next month.Edit:- Ordered 3rd time Double rich chocolate flavor is got dull I'll some new flavour next time may be Mocha Cappuccino :)Yeah and this time packaging was damaged  there was big whole in it but fortunately my product was safe.Amazon Be ready for my next order in next month.Edit:- Now this is my last edit,I tried Mocha cappuccino, Double rich chocolate, Extreme Milk Chocolate flavours and believe me, Mocha cappuccino is the only best flavour for me :). Now I'm gonna stick to Moch.Don't worry cloudtail selling genuine product :).

name: vicky
title: Finally, ON Gold Standard. My 1st Protein Supplement
text: This is my 1st protein Supplement. And as it's almost everywhere top ranked among the best proteins. I played safe and bought it.  There are a few things i was considering while buying a supplement and 1 of them was safety. And With state-of-the-art production facilities.. you gotta have some trust.Taste: better with milk 4.5/5 but will do with water too 3/5Recovery: 4/5Mixability: No problem at all, 5/5next on... I'd love to try Dymatize ISO 100.

name: BeLiVE
title: Hey, it's ON!!
text: After taking suggestions from my gym's pros, who are in to fitness from more than 2years, I ordered this. Like others, I was also in doubt whether the product will be original or duplicate cos duplicates are also available in market. But guys this product is 100% original and I showed to my gym trainer also. It mixes well with water and you can bear it's taste as well.  In the product description they have mentioned few guidelines just to make sure the product is original. Make sure you see the expiry date as well. It was delivered on the expected date with a very good packaging. Totally loved it!

name: Srivas
title: Great Protein powder; mediocre flavor (Rocky Road)
text: I have always used Optimum Nutrition as my primary source of protein. I find it better than most other brands, and even though it's quite expensive, I feel that the extra price you pay is worth it.I have always used the Vanilla flavor, and this time, thought I'd shake things up a bit and try a different flavor for a change. Rocky Road is good, but a bit too creamy, in my opinion. Maybe my taste buds are just used to vanilla, but the Rocky Road flavor always leaves an aftertaste in my mouth, which I don't like at all. If you're getting it, I suggest getting some other flavor.Vanilla, Chocolate and Cappuccino are all great flavors.The product itself is original, and came with the authentication sticker (Seller: Primarc Pecan Retail; They are the official importers in India for ON). I don't know why so many people claim to have gotten a spurious product, because I always order this from Amazon, and have never received a duplicate.

name: Shubhadeep Mukhopadhyay
title: TAKE TIME & READ THE WHOLE REVIEW THOROUGHLY. I hope you will find every tiny detail that you want/need in this review.
text: I WILL GIVE THE FULL REVIEW POINT BY POINT (with attached Photos). ENJOY AND KEEP READING, YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED.Just to clarify and to be honest, this is the first time I'm using a Whey protein, not just the brand but Whey protein itself. Though, I was very skeptical about the purchase after reading so many reviews about the product being fake, I still decided to order it.ABOUT THE JAR/TUB (AUTHENTICITY CHECK from the outside): There was a strong chocolate smell on the outside of the jar already. I checked the bottom of the jar and the tub looked normal. Mfd and Exp date had exactly 2 years gap. I did not find any tampering marks whatsoever.There was the "ON Authentic seal" on the neck band. I checked everything thoroughly before opening it. The QR code on the jar itself led me to product page of Optimum Nutrition website.The QR code on the importer sticker led me to Bright Commodities authenticity checking page. I scratched the Importer sticker for the hidden code and entered all the details and it said that the product is authentic.After opening the jar, I did find the seal attached on the lid.The jar was kind of half filled, not up to the brim. (Doubt 1)I also found the golden scoop with the branding on it and Made in USA written inside the scoop along with some other details.SMELL, CONSISTENCY AND TEXTURE OF THE POWDER: The power smelled nice and the texture was normal I think (First time user), not clumpy or anything.No stickiness at all, the powder did not stick to the inside of the jar. (Authenticity checking method found somewhere online)One thing that I noticed was that, the powder had some white particles in it. (Doubt 2)Now, to clear out my doubts I called 011-49594959 which was Glanbia Performance Nutrition. I followed the instructions given by the IVR and asked about my doubts. The customer executive was helpful enough and told that "The product is 100% authentic. The jar is supposed to be filled half way and the white particles are 'Amino Acids'."I was satisfied with all the authenticity checking and all.TASTE: Though it smelled really chocolaty, the taste was just okay. According to me, it had a medicinal taste to it.Consistency was okay, not thick at all, it might just be the amount of water I added. (1 full scoop in one glass of water)MIXABILITY: It mixed with the water fairly easily. Found 1 tiny lump, and by "tiny" I really mean tiny, most of the people won't even notice it probably. I noticed it because I was trying to find lumps intentionally. Now, keep in mind that I did not use a shaker, it was simply stirred with a spoon in a glass. I did not even stir vigorously. So, mixability is good I think.RATING: Now, talking about the rating, I gave it a 4* just because the taste was okay.

name: Amrut
title: FULL REVIEW
text: First of all would like to appreciate amazon for the fast delivery, cuz I got the product in 1 day of ordering.I was worried after seeing the reviews that my whey could turn out to be fake and I will regret buying from Amazon but it turned out to be genuine and although the Amazon seller was Cloudtailindia the product is indeed imported by Bright commodities which is the official importer of ON in india. To check the authenticity of the whey always watch videos on YouTube regarding "how to identify fake ON whey from original one's" before buying so that you can check it quickly once it arrives.Make sure on the day of the delivery you install a QR and barcode scanner app on your smartphone to quickly scan the codes on the tub which will take you to the official ON Website. As of the whey itself I'm completely relieved because it genuine and it's a trusted and no. 1 brand through the decade.i'd ordered double rich choc.My review on the product :1)TASTE - 8/102)MIXABILITY - 9/10 (always mix w/ cold water/milk)3)QUALITY - 10/104) EFFICIENCY* - 9/10..*efficiency could relate from person to person since it's based on many factors such as age, workout intensity,diet, dedication etc.dont expect to build a muscular body without working out hardcore in the gym and maintaining a healthy diet of egg whites,chicken,veggies and protein shake(remember it's a supplement not a whole food)THANK YOU.if any doubts feel free to dm me on Insta - amrut_p49

name: Prithivi Raj
title: Rocky Road, OSM PAWSOME.
text: I have Already given a review about the authenticity of this product. If possible find that post in which i have included the pic of the official whey gold standard suppliers in India's name. Now this is all bout flavor. :P OH MAN!  Had the best experience today with rocky road, which reminded me to write a review. IT IS FREAKING YUMMIEEEEE. Now you see I'm not a sweet tooth. Sweet or no sweet i like. But this.. this is osm. one among the best. Heard " MILKY CHOCOLATE " is like 20 times better than rocky road! o.O REALLY? well to find that out, I did a Evil deed by suggesting it to my friend, his product is about to arrive, will have a sip of it and let you know about that taste too. ;)I take my protien with coconut water - Review - Sweet, Refreshing, and Yumiee.I take my protien with plain water - Review - Little Bland, Yummie. (( Little is actually a perfect word here, only a little you can hardly tell. ))I Take my protien with milk ------- Review ------- MAN MAN MAN! I JUS WANNA DRINK IT ALL DAY LONG, ALL THE TIME. ALL THE FREAKING TIME.

name: Leila
title: A good source of quality PROTEIN!
text: The product has a rich pleasant flavour. More importantly, it mixes very easily and there are no lumps. The measure scoop is handy. For those seeking good quality protein supplement and have a taste for chocolate - well, Optimum Protein 100% Whey is the answer. The pricing is a little on the high side which may put off younger groups with less fat wallets.

name: shrinivas patil
title: Good product with excellent service by Amazon
text: I bought this Amazon fulfilled product. It was sealed perfectly leaving no doubt oftampering. Amazon service was excellent and I received the product on time. The protein is good in taste and provides the required energy for workout as well as a good energy replenisher post workouts. It mixes well with water with no granules left behind. The chocolate flavour is good and is not too sweet . I am satisfied with the product .

name: Amazon Customer
title: Fake Product
text: Usually I order via health cart and products were good. The current product taste bad, does not mix well and no way a original product. Amazon must take extra protection so that consumer are not duped or money more importantly health. Will never take risk with these kinds of products at Amazon. Very very disappointed.

name: Sanket S.
title: quality product, great taste!!
text: Optimum Nutrition's 100% Gold Standard is the no.1 product not just because of its name.. It truly is a great product!! If u work hard at the gym, leave the rest to this product.. It has done wonders to me in just a couple of weeks.. The cookie n cream tastes just awesome.. Many a days I go to the gym just to have this great tasting drink!! 100% satisfied.. Exceeded my expectations!!!

name: Naveenkumar
title: Orignal product and few things need to be known
text: Received Original product. had Hologram in nect of the Jar. I like to share few things for the below questions and which degrades the quality of the seller and ON  and for the negative comments we see in net.1)No hologram on the 1 lb - I have seen complaints about the Primarc pecan sellar. What I believe is, They dont sell fake product and damage their brand name. People search for hologram in 1 lbs jar and they say its fake product since they dont find them. actually 1 lbs doesnt come with Hologram since it's almost like a trial pack. you can simply confirm the authenticity from the Aroma when u open the Jar. (They didnt update the images- the product u receive might have 23g of protein which is not gold standard)2) Jar is not sealed inside - To verify this, I have searched couple of vids of unpacking the ON 2lbs in which White lid is not sticked and covered the Jar opening instead it was attached to the cap. So dont think u have a fake product when u see the white lid is attached with the cap of jar.3) I dont see the result - I am not sure why guys are expecting so much outta it. It s just a supplement. You gotta eat healthy and must be taking proper amount of protein, fat and carbs with proper workout routine. If u miss out any one of this, you will not see proper result. some body structure may not digest this supplement as expected. In worst case, U might not see the result :( (You can skip the Supplement and it can be compensated with Proper foods).Some tips- Eat - Egg white, Whole wheat bread, chicken breast, oats(complex carbs) ,avoid sat fat and trans fat and drink at least 5 lts of water per day. All the best Guys..

name: Durgesh Kothari
title: Good product although I prefer Dymatize for taste
text: Nice product but the taste is just ok. I prefer Dymatize Caf? Mocha as the taste is much richer and tastier. I definitely feel stronger since using whey protein. On bodybuilding.com a US site, they rated ON as one of the best brands. I don't trust the Indian brands although cheaper because they aren't properly regulated or testing in India.

name: Suresh Kumar
title: firstly i would like to say that i am doubtful about the product ...
text: Hi all, firstly i would like to say that i am doubtful about the product bcoz after openning the lid of the jar, there was no seal on the mouth of the jar. so plz if anybody used this product before , then tell me that is it ok ? or something wrong with me. so plz  reply me fast or post ur review plzzzzzzzz...........

name: Rajiv Pillai
title: Great to taste with a promising nutrition
text: For a first timer, I must admit that the taste of Double Chocolate is definitely good. It's too early and too little to comment about the health benefits but hopefully it should be great as well. The only drawback as compared to Nutrilite Protein Powder, is that this isn't a family protein powder. You can't give it to children below 18 who need protein equally well.

name: PS
title: Simply awesum number 1 product always
text: One of the finest whey protein supplement we have in the market is this one, i am using it from past 4-5 months and i must say that i saw a huge difference in my muscle gain ability, yeah it also depends what diet you are taking , but this supplement is best even bodybuilding.com also announced it number 1 product, so without even thinking just go for it you will start feel the difference in muscle gain within one month.

name: Ashish
title: Beginners ..this is for you.
text: this is just for beginners. No side effects. taste is 10/10(double rich chocolate) ,6/10(rocky road..its too sweet but no calories) mixablity 9/10, Results 9/10. Used this and pretty happy with the results. For results you should atleast wait for 3 weeks. About the authenticity , check site and make sure you are ordering from the official importer.September and november : prime peccanUpdate december : purchased from cloudtail. Recieved and damaged box with a lot of scratches ( mfg date 06/16)

name: SudR
title: Fake and disappointing even amazon couldn't guarantee the quality.
text: Bought this product from cloudtail and tried with just 6 oz of water. Recommended water level is 6 to 8oz.. Its totally run down and there is not a bit of chocolate taste in mix.  Extremely unhappy with the fake ones sold even on a site like amazon.. They conveniently marked the product as non returnable.. Very upsetting to see how low they are reaching to make money even on food items.

name: Akhil P Walia
title: Best Whey
text: Genuine import and tastes good. Even though I am not cash strapped...but I still find it expensive......every time I make my drink..I am ultra careful about not spilling even a small amount out of the jar or under the fan. I ensure I drink each and every drop to the last!

name: Karsh
title: Fast Delivery. Tastes Great!
text: The tub has a capacity of about 4lbs but they're handing out those for 2lbs of whey. Genuine waste of plastic and resources.Other than that, it tastes pretty good n doesn't need any additional sweeteners like sugarfree.The delivery was really quick. Received my order in just 2 days.NOTE: If you want to check whether the product is Original, use the QR Code on the box. When you scan it, it should direct you to the official ON website with all the details about your product. If the Code doesn't work, then its FAKE.Also i'll update my review after a month to let ya'll know whether it helped me with muscle growth or not.

name: Varun Verma
title: Best value for moneyb
text: Use it as my postworkout.Helps a lot in my cutting.Note: Please do not mix with milk as it is isolate and drinking with milk defeats the whole purpose.Havw it with water.Make sure only 10-20% of your entire protien intake is coming from supplements and 80% from whole foodsI got it for 2,200 in subscribe and save for rich chocolate flavour and now they no longer have subscribe and save for this product.

name: Madhav
title: Please double check before you place the order
text: Received on Time,Scanned the QR on the box and found that the product was authentic as per the qr code on the boxNot sure about the importer, coz I placed an order with "Primarc Pecan Retail " and I see the importer name as "Bright"Taste was not so great, I prefer, Vanilla or strawberry to that of Chocolate, tried it for the fiurst time.

name: OEL
title: Disappointed!
text: It was not sealed when delivered, anyone could adulterate it therefore the experience started with shaky confidence. Taste really bad, so bad that my body immediately rejected it by puking it out. I ordered chocolate flavour but all I got was sawdust and so it further reinforced My vote of no confidence for the product. Then I finally lost complete confidence when it had no result. I have been using this for over 2 months and nothing. My previous protein had better result within a month. I will go back to using that. so to encapsulate...1- Wasn't sealed, 2-Taste like sawdust, 3- No result. What do you think I bought ?

name: Amazon Customer
title: Just outer Seal?
text: Everything was fine until I found out that inner seal was missing. However when I searched about this issue many say that it will be packed either with inner or outer seal with ON Hologram and the whey powder will give out strong odour when opened and yes it did. When I verified the product with ON and ON distributors in India and said my product is genuine and also from the links it matches how real product this is to be when I crosschecked with fake Whey. So guys container should have either inner or outer seal.

name: Sumeet Jain
title: This is the Second time, I have purchased this ...
text: This is the Second time , I have purchased this product and it is completely genuine. As compared to Neulife stores selling it for  INR 3350/- for a 2 LB  double rich chocolate pack, it's much cheaper here on Amazon. Fully sealed pack received.

name: Ankur Singh
title: deserves 5 stars
text: The main thing and to the point...the product is genuine and im 100% sure about it....i checked from the makers website...the delivery was prime so next day it was there...it was sealed with genuine seal of the maker optimum....thanks and happy...i suggest buy from seller whos name is on optimum website as authorised importer...sometime its costly then other sellers but feeling of genuinity is there...this is not a product for gaining weight or to become huge...its for giving urself adequate protein after workout so that u dont get muscle erosion...

name: Maverick
title: This is the best money can buy
text: Costly but worth it ... This is the best money can buy..... It's important to pick your seller.... This is a renowned company.... Don't take chance with cheap products or unknown brands...

name: Titus C.
title: got the product in good shape.
text: I received it on time..got the product in good shape..my first use after platinum hydrowhey..mixability is really good..I can feel the difference...but I received the product without inner seal even though it had importers hologram and ON hologram  over the neck seal.

name: Ashok v Kurup
title: Adulterated Product - Bright Commodities
text: I recently bought this - Double rich chocolate flavor. The jar looks all good and original. But the product within is adulterated. I compared this with the same stuff bought from US and I could clearly taste the difference. The original product tastes like your health drinks (like boost, bournvita) It has a rick chocolaty flavor. This product, on the other hand, has a mix of chocolaty and bitter taste.

name: Rigveda Bhave
title: Fake product on second order! Differences mentioned!
text: This is my second time ordering this product. I received a genuine product two months ago but I have received a completely FAKE bottle this time. I have highlighted all the differences between the genuine (left, green circles) and fake (right, red circles) product. The fake powder does not dissolve completely and has white flecks in it. DO NOT follow the QR code on the white sticker. It leads to a fake website. The correct QR code is on the bottle next to the barcode itself and leads to the ON USA website.

name: Atul Nemlekar
title: How to check whether it's a genuine product.
text: 1. On the containers lid there is one golden colour "ON Gold Standard" sticker which is sticked on to the black protection seal.2. There are two QR codes:i) "ON" Container QR Code-It is imprinted on the left hand side of the barcode, after scanning this QR code the official website of "ON" will be opened.ii) Disributors QR Code + Serial Number- The second QR code is of supplier in which there will be one QR code along with that a serial number  will be provided which is hidden under a silver sticker. Just scan this code and enter the details along with your serial number, this will show you whether your product is genuine or not.3. On the base of the container manufacturing and expiry date of the product is imprinted. On the website the date is printed in blue colour but the product which I have recieved has yellow colour printing.4. Mix the whey protein powder in water if it mixes properly then it's genuine and if there is residue with small lumps then it is fake.

name: Vaibhav Marathe
title: The best whey protein since 11 years
text: On Gold Standard 100% Whey protein is continuously winning awards from 11 years as the best isolate whey protein and i'm using it from 2 years the best ever whey protein with the best results you get. Well talking about the flavour that it has More than 18 different flavours than any other whey protein manufacturer has.For better results take it immediately after your workout and try to take minimum 2 to 3 scoops daily as i take 1 scoop one hour later in morning after breakfast mixed with yoghurt and 1.5 scoop after workout in evening but keep in mind don't eat for 1 hour after consuming it let it get digested and then take your meals otherwise you are wasting your whey protein.Tips to find the product is genuine or not1. Lot Number : Every optimum nutrition product has a lot number which signifies that it belongs to the original ON product batch. This number can be found on the bottom of the jar.2. MFG and Expiry Date : Always check manufacturing date and expiry date. An expired product is of no use because it can give you serious side effects.3. Product Label : ON Gold Standard 100% Whey?? product label is printed with dark and vibrant colors with a shiny and smooth finish. You should check the label thoroughly, it should not look flimsy. It also lists 24g WPI, 5.5g BCAAs and 4g Glutamine. You should check that this info is correct on your label.4. Grammatical Errors : There is no room for grammatical errors on Optimum Nutrition?? product label. If you find any errors on the product label then it is fake.5. Check Seal : The container should be sealed properly from outside especially the lid is properly sealed if ON Gold 100 Whey is genuine. The seal is shiny and also the lead. Do not accept if there is no seal.6. Check Manufacturer?? Address : All ON products are mostly manufactured in the USA, so your Whey protein container should have the USA manufactures address. Check the back of the container.7. Scan The Bar Code : On the jar you will find a QR code and a bar code. Just scan these codes with your smartphone by using a QR code scanning app. It will show you product details. If the details come to be about ON Gold Standard 100% Whey then its genuine otherwise fake.#Flavours are rated above.??Extereme milk chocolate 10/10??Double rich chocolate. 9/10??Chocolate mint 8/10??Vanila ice cream. 8/10??Rocky road. 7/10??Mocha cappuccino. 10/10???Birthday cake. 7/10??Although my favourite is mocha cappuccino and extreme milk chocolate but mostly i take mocha cappuccino Because it taste little bit like coffee and i take it in cold low fat milk that's why it taste like cold coffee.So guys i think you will find this helpful.??This time the packaging was worse the jar was damaged but it is genuine. But This does not happen all the time. ??

name: Amazon_Shopper
title: Best whey protein on earth. Tips to find out the fake ones.
text: First of all I didn't buy this whey protein from Amazon. I bought it from authorized neulife store. Double Rich Chocolate is the best flavor of ON 100% Whey and has a mouth watering taste even with water. Milk gives more rich taste and you will feel that you just have eaten a double chocolate drink. Its taste is awesome.Now I am here to tell you guys about spotting the fake ON Whey protein and also I will address some misconceptions about this product which are unnecessarily degrading its value.Tips to check the genuine ON Whey1. First of all if you are worried about the genuinity then I would suggest you buy ON protein only from three sources. These three sources are neulife online store (neulife online store), neulife retail store, and finally Cloudtail India on Amazon. There is no doubt that neulife is the oldest importer of ON products in India so you can buy from them with confidence. I contacted Glanbia India customer care and they have confirmed this that neulife directly imports ON products from Glanbia and they also said that Cloudtail India is also their trusted ON whey seller. If you are buying from Cloudtail and getting ON Whey with a 'Bright commodities' sticker then it's all genuine.2. Neulife has a better system of verifying their ON Whey products. Every neulife ON Whey product has a unique code, QR code that you have to scan or SMS to neulife to verify it. I instantly got a message that "My ON whey is genuine". You can only verify it once though.3. The double rich chocolate flavor is awesome and when you mix it with water it forms a white creamy layer and taste if awesome exactly like double rich chocolate.4. If you are mixing one scoop with little water then it will the real chocolate taste with very very little bitterness exactly like a dark chocolate. It is sweet also. The bitterness is sometimes unnoticeable, this bitterness feels exactly the same on tongue after eating a dark chocolate.5. DRC flavor smells like chocolate and have tiny white in it.6. Comes with golden seal which is printed on the black label.Misconceptions:Some people say that they are getting fake supplements and half of the powder is fake. Some also say that the sellers cut the container from the bottom and remove the original powder and fill it with some fake powder. But I checked my container from inside after emptying it and found that the bottom is intact from inside and no sign of cutting the container was found. Please check attached images for clarification.But if you buy from neulife then there is no problem. Cloudtail India sells genuine ON whey as confirmed by Glanbia Performance Nutrition, but I can't say about the delivery agents. Buying supplements online are also not good in summers as these supplements need cool places to store while during transit the whey powder go though heat which may degrade its quality.If you are going to GYM then stay away from trainer's advice over this and never buy even if he gives you heavy discounts. This gym trainers will never give you the protein imported legally, they will either sell you grey market stuff which is mostly fake or they sell you supplements that are imported from unknown sources. Stay away from these fake trainers if you love your body.I was shocked to know that my GYM trainer doesn't know about neulife.So buy your protein from neulife or cloudtail only. Also stay away from low quality supplements like MuscleBlaze, don't get fooled in the name of made in India whey protein. ON is the best whey protein in the world. It is light on stomach and won't give you headaches or stomach pain. It is digested easily and helps in muscle building.Attached images for more info.

name: Prime Customer
title: Use common sense
text: You dont need supplements to build muscle.Because for body weight of 76kg you need nearly 150g of protein.And whey protein gives 24g for 1scoop so if 2lb is around Rs.3000 each scoop costs Rs.100 and you are still at deficit of neatly 135g.Chicken is even better a kilo costs Rs 130 and boneless breasts costs Rs. 200 and 100gm of the same costs Rs 20 and gives 31g of protein and 1gm fat. So having twice gives you 61gm of protein and costs Rs. 40 and with milk, eggs & oats, roti/chapati & rajma/channa/chole gives you full protein daily requirement all totalling under Rs. 100.So it makes no sense to buy supplements. Its like this as if you drinking horlicks makes you taller stronger and sharper and you've been drinking it since your childhood and you know the results.I am not saying taking supplements wont build muscles it does actually. But it makes no difference if you take chicken or egg or whey protein or milk. Protein is protein.All that matters is meeting your daily protein requirement of nealy 1.5 or 2gm of protein / kg of body weight and incase you are deficit in your daily requirement of say 25g you supplement it with supplements hence the name supplements ie you complete your deficit gap by supplementing it with shakes.And it makes no sense to make it as primary protein food and drink 6 scoops to meet such requirement spend Rs.10000 a month when normal food costs under Rs. 1500 and meets all your requirement.People in US usually take 2 scoops not because whey protein builds more muscle but because a pound of chicken or ~450g costs 6-8 dollars which can make up for 2 or 3 servings or one to one and half days so for a month it costs them considering $7 as average it costs $210. So in US whey protein is cheaper but in india chicken is cheaper.Its all consumerism they want you to buy so that they can make money.WRT preworkout creatine it makes no difference its just placebo effect. Ive used it for 2 years. Your strength grows naturally over time with or without creatine just eat proper normal food. And there is no better pre workout than a banana/rice

text: IT IS IMPORTANT TO UPVOTE RECENT REVIEWS TO ENSURE QUALITY IS MAINTAINEDI ordered ON 1 KG after a lot of deliberation. I regret the decision now. I had contemplated using the "Subscribe and Save" to get some discounts, but when they have no assurance on age of the product, it is pointless.Background: I ordered in Jan 2021 and got a product manufactured in June 2019. The expiry date for the box is June 2021. I did not check it prior to opening. Also it does not taste good (not like the previous ones I have had). It probably was not stored right as the TASTE HAS GONE BAD. Will not buy this ever again from Amazon.The authentication sticker validates the box - But the box itself is not tamperproof and the seal is more like a heat-shrink seal. Not sure it is authentic.

name: Khagendra
title: Read It
text: Brand is famous and doesn't need any review however it is bit costly because of it's popularity.Take it but with safety.1. Never take more than necessary protein because excess protein can damage kidney. Yes we believe if we take extra, we will be stronger however it has side effects and shoud be consumed in safe limit.2. When you take protein you must drink minimum 3 litres of water. Again drinking excess water helps kidney to flush out excess urea and also excess unconsumed protein.3. When you don't excercise, don't take it. Many guys keep consuming it even after they don't go to gym or workout. Don't take it as a health nutrition.4. When you visit any gym, the gym trainer try to brainwash you to buy protein powder. Never listen to the gym guy because he gets commision to sell protein powder. If you really need, get one. Also don't buy the brand suggested by gym trainer. To get high commission they suggest you any other brand and they don't care about your health. They just care about their commision.Thanks for reading. Cheers!

name: akshay kumar
title: Genuine product
text: Brought this product through the seller cloudtail. I checked through few ways and found it to be a genuine product.How to identify:1. Check if there is a hologram (golden colour) at the cap2. Look for the manufacturing details and batch code at the bottom of the bottle . It should be in blue colour . The manufacturing date should be of a difference of 2 years exactly .3. Check for any spelling mistakes4. Scan the QR code and make sure it leads to their original site .5. Inside the bottle , there will be a scoop and it should be in golden colour with the ON logo .6. The powder should be very light like a talcum powder .Hope this gives you a better idea to check whether it?? genuine .Thank you cloudtail for delivering it in one day and I hope this whey protein gives me a good result .

name: sandeep
title: Genuine product
text: I bought it from cloudtail india and its a genuine product. I have used it twice and it is good for fulfilling the protein content required by your body. I will recommend to those who are doing workout, gyming or exercises and require high protein content for muscle building. If you can complete your required protein content by food like eggs, chicken breasts, etc then there is no need of this protein powder. Therefore don?? buy it blindly, firstly do analyse your body protein needs, workout goals and daily protein intake you are getting currently then go for it. No issues with the product and the brand as it is 100% genuine of Optimum Nutrition.

name: Anurag
title: Good Quality Whey Protein
text: I purchased this product multiple times. Tast is ok for me. I check the authenticity code and packing after doing all the outer inspection its time to check the inside stuff. As we all know pure protein is not heat soluble so I would take some water in a cup put 1 to 2 teaspoon of the whey protein powder mix it and put it in the microwave for 2 mins. After two mins you will find the powder has turned into solid in indian language it will be like (fata hua dudh). We are set and ready to use the product tension free and focus on working out and putting extra effort.

name: Antra Maurya
title: Changes in Authenticity check
text: So I watched a lot of YouTube videos regarding ON authenticity.My product did not have an importer tag also there was no blue expiry date on the bottom.So I called ON customer support and the agent mentioned below points-1. Glanbia (importer) now imports raw material from US and packaging is done in India. I guess the plant is in Himachal and established some 6 months back.2. There will be no importer tag in new ON boxes.3. Expiry date and batch number is now printed on back of the box in a white space with black ink and not on the bottom.4.No vaccum cover on the lid intead a pasted seal.5. Check authenticity by the TRU SEAL (which we all do).

name: Durgesh_Gnote
title: Good Product!
text: As the headline says, i am not sure about the effect of this product on my body. This is my third box of ON protein shake and also i am pretty regular to the GYM since last 8-9 months. But frankly speaking, i do not see major improvements in my physique. I weigh around 74 kgs. I think i need to use it for couple years then i will be able to see some muscle growth. But this product is good. I like the taste and so far i have not had any issue with my digestive system (touchwood).  I will write another review once i see some muscle growth.

name: Jayram Gowda
title: Best in class "the gold standard"
text: I got it from cloudtail better buy it from cloudtail only because they sell original I got my gnc and ON too from cloudtail fast delivery great experience and 100% authentic product I've received it just now tastes like orignal well I had a doubt on it's authenticity because there was no crease line underneath the jar which should have been there so I contacted Glanbia they asked me the batch number and I provided them they cross checked the expiry and manufactured details and it was 100% GENIUNE PRODUCT don't worry if your 2 lbs once doesn't have a crease it's because of it's weight the crease mark haven been properly engraved beneath the jar it has a bitter aftertaste as all genuine double rich chocolate have...go for it if it's from cloudtail.Update: my 3rd jar from Amazon cloudtail and it's genuine.

title: Manufactured in India?

The bottle looks authentic but the powder inside was a little off. Maybe it got damaged in Indian weather conditions. Or maybe it?? Indian ON. I don?? know. text: 2lb. Rocky Road. My issue with this particular purchase was that the cap was not tightly shut, even though the seal was intact. Some powder leaked out. title: STALE stock: expire in 6 months (total 24 month). Suspected authenticity too - only box is authentic
text: IT IS IMPORTANT TO UPVOTE RECENT REVIEWS TO ENSURE QUALITY IS MAINTAINEDI ordered ON 1 KG after a lot of deliberation. I regret the decision now. I had contemplated using the "Subscribe and Save" to get some discounts, but when they have no assurance on age of the product, it is pointless.Background: I ordered in Jan 2021 and got a product manufactured in June 2019. The expiry date for the box is June 2021. I did not check it prior to opening. Also it does not taste good (not like the previous ones I have had). It probably was not stored right as the TASTE HAS GONE BAD. Will not buy this ever again from Amazon.The authentication sticker validates the box - But the box itself is not tamperproof and the seal is more like a heat-shrink seal. Not sure it is authentic.

name: Prabhjot
title: Substandard, Made Exclusively for INDIA
text: I am taking  On's Gold standard since years.i can't say its grey market product but definately something wrong this time. Bright commodities said its genuine product when i sent scratch code but its mixability is really bad, not even mixing with shaker and taste is less chocolaty,i dnt feel any heavyness in stomach after having it. Noticed few changes in packaging. It clearly says FOR EXPORT ONLY and they are printing India's FSSAI green mark on label in USA. Feels like its substandard product. Manufacturing exclusively for people of India. I dnt know whats wrong but its definitely not On's Gold standard Whey that we had earlier. Discarding it and switching to Rule 1 or wild whey

name: Khagendra
title: Read It
text: Brand is famous and doesn't need any review however it is bit costly because of it's popularity.Take it but with safety.1. Never take more than necessary protein because excess protein can damage kidney. Yes we believe if we take extra, we will be stronger however it has side effects and shoud be consumed in safe limit.2. When you take protein you must drink minimum 3 litres of water. Again drinking excess water helps kidney to flush out excess urea and also excess unconsumed protein.3. When you don't excercise, don't take it. Many guys keep consuming it even after they don't go to gym or workout. Don't take it as a health nutrition.4. When you visit any gym, the gym trainer try to brainwash you to buy protein powder. Never listen to the gym guy because he gets commision to sell protein powder. If you really need, get one. Also don't buy the brand suggested by gym trainer. To get high commission they suggest you any other brand and they don't care about your health. They just care about their commision.Thanks for reading. Cheers!

name: Mahak Jain
title: Excellent...!!
text: Oh my god....its the most delicious flavor you can ever get in protein powder...it tastes exactly like rich coffee..add some ice cubes to it when you make it with milk...it will taste exactly like rich smooth cold coffee..whenever i drink this protein powder i feel like i want more....or you can have it just plain with water....both tastes equally good....If you are really a coffee lover go for it...!!!!Best..best...!!!

text: I am frequent buyer of this product when Iam in overseas .I ordered the same from INDIA.I would recommend - PLEASE STAY AWAY FROM ORDERING HEALTH DRINKS FROM ONLINE1) There is a Authentication process of this product, but the whole process is fake, because the health drink company does endorse the company which authenticates2) The Importers of this products is also not being endorsed by the original manufacture3) AMAZON will not take accountability on the genuinity of this product by stating there are Just a sale platform.4) The Avg rating in the website for the Overall Products and not separately sold in INDIA,so don?? go by it.Note: Even today I am a frequent buyer from Amazon, but I decided not to touch any food product from these online sources.

name: akshay kumar
title: Genuine product
text: Brought this product through the seller cloudtail. I checked through few ways and found it to be a genuine product.How to identify:1. Check if there is a hologram (golden colour) at the cap2. Look for the manufacturing details and batch code at the bottom of the bottle . It should be in blue colour . The manufacturing date should be of a difference of 2 years exactly .3. Check for any spelling mistakes4. Scan the QR code and make sure it leads to their original site .5. Inside the bottle , there will be a scoop and it should be in golden colour with the ON logo .6. The powder should be very light like a talcum powder .Hope this gives you a better idea to check whether it?? genuine .Thank you cloudtail for delivering it in one day and I hope this whey protein gives me a good result .

name: sandeep
title: Genuine product
text: I bought it from cloudtail india and its a genuine product. I have used it twice and it is good for fulfilling the protein content required by your body. I will recommend to those who are doing workout, gyming or exercises and require high protein content for muscle building. If you can complete your required protein content by food like eggs, chicken breasts, etc then there is no need of this protein powder. Therefore don?? buy it blindly, firstly do analyse your body protein needs, workout goals and daily protein intake you are getting currently then go for it. No issues with the product and the brand as it is 100% genuine of Optimum Nutrition.

name: Anurag
title: Good Quality Whey Protein
text: I purchased this product multiple times. Tast is ok for me. I check the authenticity code and packing after doing all the outer inspection its time to check the inside stuff. As we all know pure protein is not heat soluble so I would take some water in a cup put 1 to 2 teaspoon of the whey protein powder mix it and put it in the microwave for 2 mins. After two mins you will find the powder has turned into solid in indian language it will be like (fata hua dudh). We are set and ready to use the product tension free and focus on working out and putting extra effort.

name: Antra Maurya
title: Changes in Authenticity check
text: So I watched a lot of YouTube videos regarding ON authenticity.My product did not have an importer tag also there was no blue expiry date on the bottom.So I called ON customer support and the agent mentioned below points-1. Glanbia (importer) now imports raw material from US and packaging is done in India. I guess the plant is in Himachal and established some 6 months back.2. There will be no importer tag in new ON boxes.3. Expiry date and batch number is now printed on back of the box in a white space with black ink and not on the bottom.4.No vaccum cover on the lid intead a pasted seal.5. Check authenticity by the TRU SEAL (which we all do).

name: Christopher raj

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good but only recommended for coffee drinkers
text: So I ordered the mocha cappuccino flavour. The taste is 7/10 and the mixability is 9/10 since I use a shaker bottle. However this particular flavour contains actual coffee, so if you're not a regular coffee drinker and have low caffeine tolerance like me, you're gonna feel the effects of coffee when you drink this. For instance, when I had this in the evenings, I couldn't fall asleep at night. So if you're gonna go ahead and buy this, make sure you're ok with this or you're a  regular coffee drinker and have high tolerance.

name: Nitish Negi
title: A very well presented FAKE powder
text: Well this is a very well done FAKE product.Now you guys must be wondering that how am I this sure about the quality of the product.So here it goes.I have been consuming this product from the last 1 year. And every time I have asked my known ones to get it from any GNC store in USA.So from the beginning I have consumed the genuine product.And now comes the interesting part. Why I am sure that this product is not Genuine.So the one I ordered from here was sweet like a chocolate powder that is used to make chocolate shake. The original GNC one I ordered was not sweet at all. It tasted all bland. Moreover the Sugar Content in the ingredients of the packing is 1gram per serving. Low enough that you just won't taste it. Just as in case of the GNC one.Also, when I first opened the jar, there were a hell lot of white particles all around the powder that were not mixed. I never saw anything like this in my previous protein of same make and type.Checkout the image I have attached.Another one was the powder seemed to be as if moisture has had its effect on it. The one I consumed from GNC was just like "Maida" with not moisture.Now at last, this is a very well presented fake product.Think I am just defaming it? Go ahead! Buy it.I don't care if you still want to have it.But would love to at least speak it out and help someone who isn't aware of such things.Peace!EDIT: Tried placing a replacement order just to see if I accidentally received the fake one. But to my surprise, it was 'MORE FAKE' than the previous one. This time, not only the powder but the whole packaging was copied and was fake. There was "S" missing in the "ISOLATES" in from on the box. Also, there was a difference in the design of the label.Have placed a return now.

name: Swapnil
title: Amazon Be ready for my next order in next month ;)
text: Thank you very much,Cloudtail for selling productAmazon for making it available and good customer support "When I contact them for asking what if I get a fake product what will happen they said it's not eligible for return but if I received fake they will provide full support to me"But at the end I received genuine product: )Just I have one question (which I asked in question section so please answer it)Double chocolate taste like a little bit medicine like sweetner not like natural sweet sugar may be that's because there is artificial sugar in product: :) don't know 1st time buying it.I done following checks:-1.Container shape2.Dhakan shining :D3.spelling mistakesImportant: -4.Golden seal on neck5.Barcode on tub leading to Optimum nutrition site6.Barcode on "bright commodities" sticker leading to authentication process7.Scratching on "Bright commodities" sticker to get a code to put on official "Bright commodities" site for authentication8.Hole if someone try to remove original power and replace it with fakeFollowing things final things telling you quality of product: -9.Smell10.Mixing with water (yes if you kept it still particles at top will try to come together)And do mixing in glass mug so that you can see if particles are settling down (doesn't settle in case of original when check after 7-8 sec)11. Doesn't taste exactly like natural sugar sweet but something similar to sweetners.May be I put a lot of waterSo yeah thats all.Edit:- Ordered 2nd time :)This time I did a replacement because I was not satisfied with the quality of my first order and Amazon was really helpful in that.Amazon Be ready for my next order in next month.Edit:- Ordered 3rd time Double rich chocolate flavor is got dull I'll some new flavour next time may be Mocha Cappuccino :)Yeah and this time packaging was damaged  there was big whole in it but fortunately my product was safe.Amazon Be ready for my next order in next month.Edit:- Now this is my last edit,I tried Mocha cappuccino, Double rich chocolate, Extreme Milk Chocolate flavours and believe me, Mocha cappuccino is the only best flavour for me :). Now I'm gonna stick to Moch.Don't worry cloudtail selling genuine product :).

name: vicky
title: Finally, ON Gold Standard. My 1st Protein Supplement
text: This is my 1st protein Supplement. And as it's almost everywhere top ranked among the best proteins. I played safe and bought it.  There are a few things i was considering while buying a supplement and 1 of them was safety. And With state-of-the-art production facilities.. you gotta have some trust.Taste: better with milk 4.5/5 but will do with water too 3/5Recovery: 4/5Mixability: No problem at all, 5/5next on... I'd love to try Dymatize ISO 100.

name: BeLiVE
title: Hey, it's ON!!
text: After taking suggestions from my gym's pros, who are in to fitness from more than 2years, I ordered this. Like others, I was also in doubt whether the product will be original or duplicate cos duplicates are also available in market. But guys this product is 100% original and I showed to my gym trainer also. It mixes well with water and you can bear it's taste as well.  In the product description they have mentioned few guidelines just to make sure the product is original. Make sure you see the expiry date as well. It was delivered on the expected date with a very good packaging. Totally loved it!

name: Shubhadeep Mukhopadhyay
title: TAKE TIME & READ THE WHOLE REVIEW THOROUGHLY. I hope you will find every tiny detail that you want/need in this review.
text: I WILL GIVE THE FULL REVIEW POINT BY POINT (with attached Photos). ENJOY AND KEEP READING, YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED.Just to clarify and to be honest, this is the first time I'm using a Whey protein, not just the brand but Whey protein itself. Though, I was very skeptical about the purchase after reading so many reviews about the product being fake, I still decided to order it.ABOUT THE JAR/TUB (AUTHENTICITY CHECK from the outside): There was a strong chocolate smell on the outside of the jar already. I checked the bottom of the jar and the tub looked normal. Mfd and Exp date had exactly 2 years gap. I did not find any tampering marks whatsoever.There was the "ON Authentic seal" on the neck band. I checked everything thoroughly before opening it. The QR code on the jar itself led me to product page of Optimum Nutrition website.The QR code on the importer sticker led me to Bright Commodities authenticity checking page. I scratched the Importer sticker for the hidden code and entered all the details and it said that the product is authentic.After opening the jar, I did find the seal attached on the lid.The jar was kind of half filled, not up to the brim. (Doubt 1)I also found the golden scoop with the branding on it and Made in USA written inside the scoop along with some other details.SMELL, CONSISTENCY AND TEXTURE OF THE POWDER: The power smelled nice and the texture was normal I think (First time user), not clumpy or anything.No stickiness at all, the powder did not stick to the inside of the jar. (Authenticity checking method found somewhere online)One thing that I noticed was that, the powder had some white particles in it. (Doubt 2)Now, to clear out my doubts I called 011-49594959 which was Glanbia Performance Nutrition. I followed the instructions given by the IVR and asked about my doubts. The customer executive was helpful enough and told that "The product is 100% authentic. The jar is supposed to be filled half way and the white particles are 'Amino Acids'."I was satisfied with all the authenticity checking and all.TASTE: Though it smelled really chocolaty, the taste was just okay. According to me, it had a medicinal taste to it.Consistency was okay, not thick at all, it might just be the amount of water I added. (1 full scoop in one glass of water)MIXABILITY: It mixed with the water fairly easily. Found 1 tiny lump, and by "tiny" I really mean tiny, most of the people won't even notice it probably. I noticed it because I was trying to find lumps intentionally. Now, keep in mind that I did not use a shaker, it was simply stirred with a spoon in a glass. I did not even stir vigorously. So, mixability is good I think.RATING: Now, talking about the rating, I gave it a 4* just because the taste was okay.

name: Amrut
title: FULL REVIEW
text: First of all would like to appreciate amazon for the fast delivery, cuz I got the product in 1 day of ordering.I was worried after seeing the reviews that my whey could turn out to be fake and I will regret buying from Amazon but it turned out to be genuine and although the Amazon seller was Cloudtailindia the product is indeed imported by Bright commodities which is the official importer of ON in india. To check the authenticity of the whey always watch videos on YouTube regarding "how to identify fake ON whey from original one's" before buying so that you can check it quickly once it arrives.Make sure on the day of the delivery you install a QR and barcode scanner app on your smartphone to quickly scan the codes on the tub which will take you to the official ON Website. As of the whey itself I'm completely relieved because it genuine and it's a trusted and no. 1 brand through the decade.i'd ordered double rich choc.My review on the product :1)TASTE - 8/102)MIXABILITY - 9/10 (always mix w/ cold water/milk)3)QUALITY - 10/104) EFFICIENCY* - 9/10..*efficiency could relate from person to person since it's based on many factors such as age, workout intensity,diet, dedication etc.dont expect to build a muscular body without working out hardcore in the gym and maintaining a healthy diet of egg whites,chicken,veggies and protein shake(remember it's a supplement not a whole food)THANK YOU.if any doubts feel free to dm me on Insta - amrut_p49

name: Prithivi Raj
title: Rocky Road, OSM PAWSOME.
text: I have Already given a review about the authenticity of this product. If possible find that post in which i have included the pic of the official whey gold standard suppliers in India's name. Now this is all bout flavor. :P OH MAN!  Had the best experience today with rocky road, which reminded me to write a review. IT IS FREAKING YUMMIEEEEE. Now you see I'm not a sweet tooth. Sweet or no sweet i like. But this.. this is osm. one among the best. Heard " MILKY CHOCOLATE " is like 20 times better than rocky road! o.O REALLY? well to find that out, I did a Evil deed by suggesting it to my friend, his product is about to arrive, will have a sip of it and let you know about that taste too. ;)I take my protien with coconut water - Review - Sweet, Refreshing, and Yumiee.I take my protien with plain water - Review - Little Bland, Yummie. (( Little is actually a perfect word here, only a little you can hardly tell. ))I Take my protien with milk ------- Review ------- MAN MAN MAN! I JUS WANNA DRINK IT ALL DAY LONG, ALL THE TIME. ALL THE FREAKING TIME.

name: Amazon Customer
title: It seems to be a FAKE product
text: If you visit Optimum Nutrition official website to check the genuineness of their product, there are several tests that they recommend. And the product which I received didn't passed those tests.1. There is absolutely no seal, which is completely is contrast to what the website said. Product is readily available to rotate the cap anticlockwise and use. It's just like every other home container.2. The hologram is sticker on above the cap. Not in proper place.3. Container's bottom is not matching the description that's stated on official website.I've performed these tests only on packaging and container and it looks fake that way. However, I haven't used any sort of protein before so I'm clueless how to test the actual product.N.B.: I'm only doubting the genuineness of this product by looking at the packaging because it doesn't match the one described on the official website. However if that's how its supposed to be, than its also possible that it may be a genuine product.

name: Atul Nemlekar
title: How to check whether it's a genuine product.
text: 1. On the containers lid there is one golden colour "ON Gold Standard" sticker which is sticked on to the black protection seal.2. There are two QR codes:i) "ON" Container QR Code-It is imprinted on the left hand side of the barcode, after scanning this QR code the official website of "ON" will be opened.ii) Disributors QR Code + Serial Number- The second QR code is of supplier in which there will be one QR code along with that a serial number  will be provided which is hidden under a silver sticker. Just scan this code and enter the details along with your serial number, this will show you whether your product is genuine or not.3. On the base of the container manufacturing and expiry date of the product is imprinted. On the website the date is printed in blue colour but the product which I have recieved has yellow colour printing.4. Mix the whey protein powder in water if it mixes properly then it's genuine and if there is residue with small lumps then it is fake.

name: Atul Kumar Singh
title: Please read this before/after you buy - to authenticate your product
text: If you??e planning to purchase this product, I request you to please read this review and key pointers for gauging product authenticity. I?? writing this review as many of other reviews are passing off even genuine products as fake owing to limited/wrong information.Before I go further, let me tell you that Optimum Nutrition (ON) Whey Protein is one of the best and most trusted products in the market and is used extensively by people hitting the gym. Hence, you don?? need to doubt the product itself, since it has proven its worth over time.When you first receive the product, Please make sure to take pictures of the box from all sides. Take zoom in picture of the Expiry Date / Batch Number. The simplest way to check for authenticity of the product is to mail the pictures to Optimum Nutrition Customer Care [Please visit the official site for contact details] on their USA customer care as well as India specific customer care (both available on official website). They work from 9AM to 5PM USA time, Monday to Friday, so don?? expect a response outside of this time. Also, please reduce the size of each image or else the server will reject the message due to large size. My first message with an attachment of 18MB was rejected by the server and I had to send it again. You need to mention below details while messaging the customer care -- Product Name- Size- Flavour- Name of the place of purchase and location (address or URL)- Country where you purchased- Seller Name or Item identification number (if purchased from an online marketplace)- Lot Number- Expiration Date- Last 5 Digits of Bar Code- Pictures of Batch Number / Exp Date / Mfd Date- Pictures of Front and back of the canister / Importer Label / Bar Codes / Invoice CopyCustomer Care should revert within 1-2 business days with details on whether product is authentic or not. In my case, they reverted within 2 days.The second step is to check for product authenticity through Bright Commodities site (if your product has been imported by Bright Commodities). Please check the box, there would be a label with importer details, a QR Code and a Scratch box on top. Scratch this box to reveal your unique product code. Now use a QR Code scanner through a smartphone, and you would land on bright commodities site, and you need to fill out a small form, and submit this unique code. On Submit, it will tell you if the product is genuine or not. In case of genuine products, it??l show: ??ongratulations. Your product is genuine.??This is sure shot way to verify if your product is genuine or not.Now, coming to ON certified methods of checking product authenticity. ON website mentions just 4 things to check if the product is authentic or not:1. NECK BAND ??Gold Standard whey protein has a black plastic neckband and a gold hologram seal. This seal is part of the neckband itself and is NOT a separate sticker. On tilting, you would see colorful ??N??written within the seal.2. TUB DESIGN - The crease on the bottom of U.S. made tubs of protein is a mold mark from plastic thermoforming. It looks the same on every tub and is normal. However, please note, Tubs produced in the U.K. have a circular indentation without a line running across the bottom. This is normal for European made tubs.3. DATE & BATCH CODE - On the BOTTOM or SIDE of protein tubs you??l find ink jet printing listing a manufacture date, expiration date and batch code. Powdered products have a 2-year shelf life, so the dates should be 2 years apart. This date is printed usually in Blue (mostly) or yellow color. Also, if you rub over it too much, it??l be removed.4. VACUUM BARRIERS - Under the cap of protein tubs is a cardboard vacuum barrier that helps hold the powder in place during shipping. This round disk is not for sanitation and is not glued into place. It is common for the cardboard to stick under the cap. So, using a knife or any sharp thin thing, you can remove this white colored cap. Underneath (on the plastic cover of the box), you will see ??ade in USA??if the product is manufactured in the USA.Some other pointers to safeguard against duplicate product -1. Powder Texture ??Gold Standard whey protein powder texture is such that it doesn?? stick to the insides of the box. When you open the box, powder should not be sticking to the side walls of the box. [See attached pictures of how it should look]2. Mixing - Gold Standard whey protein powder readily mixes with water without forming any lumps. If your product is forming lumps even after a lot of mixing and shaking, it is a fake product.3. Powder Scoop ??Every box comes with one scoop inside, which would have ON branding and would be of Golden color. Even the scoop mentions ??ade in USA??[Please check attached pictures]4. Black Neck Band would be glossy/shiny in textureBUSTING SOME MYTHS & WRONG INFORMATION. Below points DO NOT make your product fake.1. The black band does not have ??reat taste, new improved etc??printed all over like shown on the official website?? product authentication page.ON website doesn?? mention anything about printed neck bands, it simply mentions black plastic neckband. Even on ON official website, on the product page, it shows the box with a simple black band. Even biggest USA retailer websites, they would show product with a simple black band. Hence, please don?? get misguided by some other reviews where they proclaimed a product to be fake based on this point. My product has been verified as 100% authentic by the company, you can see the pictures.2. Box mentions ??SOLATE??instead of ??SOLATES??Across ON official website, you would see products with ??solate??mentioned (See various sections like 10lb product image, recipe images etc). Top US retailers show the same imagery with ??solate??mentioned instead of ??solates?? My product was verified as authentic by the company, it mentions ??solate??3. There is no QR Code on my box, and only importer QR code is shown.These products are manufactured especially for export for certain markets. For example, products imported by bright commodities are specially manufactured to be exported to India, hence you would even see ??SSAI??mentioned near the box bar code whereas FSSAI is an Indian standard. My product has been verified by the company itself, there?? no QR code as it?? for Export only, and you can see the pictures.4. Box shows green Veg symbol and there is no such concept in the US.These products are manufactured especially for export purpose and hence follow the standards of the destination country.5. Nutrition information is quite shorter and less informative, while on official web picture it is mentioned as ??utrition Facts??and more descriptive.No, this does not make your product fake. These products are manufactured especially for export for certain markets such as India. The company is following the standards as per Indian market and as per laws laid down by the Indian government, regarding ??utrition Information?? Pick any consumable product being sold in India, as per rule, ??utrition Information??needs to be mentioned as opposed to the USA, where ??utrition Facts??terminology is being used. This is the same reason why on these products, weight is mentioned in ??/Kg??before being mentioned in ??bs??6. My box is not completely filled with protein powder.Whey protein is sold by weight not volume, and the box is usually larger than the contents it is supposed to hold. It will roughly cover 65-75% volume of the box and would never be completely filled.That?? all friends. I hope now you would be in a better state to confirm if your product is genuine or fake. I hope I was able to help you out. When I was buying this product for the first time, I was equally confused. However, with above-mentioned points you can safeguard yourself against duplicate products. Thanks a lot.

name: Amazon Customer
title: The Product is Authentic: Verified the barcode.
text: First off, the product was delivered on time, the delivery person was very polite and pleasant which was nice.The product is genuine, the first thing i did was scan the barcode and was happy to see that it was authentic. Secondly, something that everyone has qualms and questions about, is taste. How does this thing taste? The answer: It tastes good, basically like chocolate milk to put it in simple terms. This isn't a milkshake, so if your drooling over the fact that its "double chocolate ooo lala slurp slurp", go get yourself one, this is a protein supplement, the key purpose of which is not to taste good. No it is not chalky, no it has no chemical taste or artificial taste.I did extensive research on the product before getting it, it is one of the safest and most genuine protein supplements out there, except that, yes, it does contain artificial sweetener, which is one con, perhaps a big one for some of you, but other than that i have read excellent reviews on the product. One thing that i can say is, ON whey alone will not get your muscles growing like they're on steroids. A lot of whackos on here complaining about how the product isn't genuine because they aren't seeing results. I'll give it to you plain and simple. Your diet plays a much much bigger role in your muscle growth and definition and overall performance, not the supplement. The supplement does 10% of the work, 20% of the work is you working out hard, the rest which is 70% is a good balanced diet, good sleep, and overall good lifestyle. SO if you expect Whey ON to make your biceps pop like popeye, and whine if it doesn't, your probably too immature to be taking protein.
