name: Vaibhav Marathe
title: The best whey protein since 11 years
text: On Gold Standard 100% Whey protein is continuously winning awards from 11 years as the best isolate whey protein and i'm using it from 2 years the best ever whey protein with the best results you get. Well talking about the flavour that it has More than 18 different flavours than any other whey protein manufacturer has.For better results take it immediately after your workout and try to take minimum 2 to 3 scoops daily as i take 1 scoop one hour later in morning after breakfast mixed with yoghurt and 1.5 scoop after workout in evening but keep in mind don't eat for 1 hour after consuming it let it get digested and then take your meals otherwise you are wasting your whey protein.Tips to find the product is genuine or not1. Lot Number : Every optimum nutrition product has a lot number which signifies that it belongs to the original ON product batch. This number can be found on the bottom of the jar.2. MFG and Expiry Date : Always check manufacturing date and expiry date. An expired product is of no use because it can give you serious side effects.3. Product Label : ON Gold Standard 100% Whey?? product label is printed with dark and vibrant colors with a shiny and smooth finish. You should check the label thoroughly, it should not look flimsy. It also lists 24g WPI, 5.5g BCAAs and 4g Glutamine. You should check that this info is correct on your label.4. Grammatical Errors : There is no room for grammatical errors on Optimum Nutrition?? product label. If you find any errors on the product label then it is fake.5. Check Seal : The container should be sealed properly from outside especially the lid is properly sealed if ON Gold 100 Whey is genuine. The seal is shiny and also the lead. Do not accept if there is no seal.6. Check Manufacturer?? Address : All ON products are mostly manufactured in the USA, so your Whey protein container should have the USA manufactures address. Check the back of the container.7. Scan The Bar Code : On the jar you will find a QR code and a bar code. Just scan these codes with your smartphone by using a QR code scanning app. It will show you product details. If the details come to be about ON Gold Standard 100% Whey then its genuine otherwise fake.#Flavours are rated above.??Extereme milk chocolate 10/10??Double rich chocolate. 9/10??Chocolate mint 8/10??Vanila ice cream. 8/10??Rocky road. 7/10??Mocha cappuccino. 10/10???Birthday cake. 7/10??Although my favourite is mocha cappuccino and extreme milk chocolate but mostly i take mocha cappuccino Because it taste little bit like coffee and i take it in cold low fat milk that's why it taste like cold coffee.So guys i think you will find this helpful.??This time the packaging was worse the jar was damaged but it is genuine. But This does not happen all the time. ??

name: Joshua S.
title: HONEST TRUE REVIEW!!!
text: Whey protein isolate is the best form of protein to be directly absorbed into your body in the form of a liquid.Optimum nutrition gold standard hands on is the best supplement company available in the market, whatever the price may be, it assures and delivers quality protein supplements.For beginners take it slow and don?? rush to 1 scoop directly, have like a quarter a day, then after a few days go for half a scoop because your body needs to adjust to these supplements as you may get loose motions and runny stools if not consumed properly.Some of the cases are1) if you??e new and completely take 1 scoop and your body doesn?? adjust to it.2) if you consume whey on an empty stomach early morning without anything to eat and if you??e really hungry3) directly consumed whey and you go to sleepSo the best time is after your workout drink it with chilled milk as milk gives you added proteins.But remember whey is a supplement like any other who doesn?? have time to prepare 1 major meal and needs a substitute for that.Whey proteins are a fast absorbing substance and hence to process it is expensive as it has to go through numerous processes( can?? explain it in detail), hence the finished product is also expensive, but it delivers results.This cookie and cream flavour is really good I?? rate it a 4/5The absorbency I?? rate it a 3.8/5And it?? truly a genuine product.Suggestion, have a couple of bananas, oats, boiled chicken breast, peanut butter for better results.

name: Amazon_Shopper
title: Best whey protein on earth. Tips to find out the fake ones.
text: First of all I didn't buy this whey protein from Amazon. I bought it from authorized neulife store. Double Rich Chocolate is the best flavor of ON 100% Whey and has a mouth watering taste even with water. Milk gives more rich taste and you will feel that you just have eaten a double chocolate drink. Its taste is awesome.Now I am here to tell you guys about spotting the fake ON Whey protein and also I will address some misconceptions about this product which are unnecessarily degrading its value.Tips to check the genuine ON Whey1. First of all if you are worried about the genuinity then I would suggest you buy ON protein only from three sources. These three sources are neulife online store (neulife online store), neulife retail store, and finally Cloudtail India on Amazon. There is no doubt that neulife is the oldest importer of ON products in India so you can buy from them with confidence. I contacted Glanbia India customer care and they have confirmed this that neulife directly imports ON products from Glanbia and they also said that Cloudtail India is also their trusted ON whey seller. If you are buying from Cloudtail and getting ON Whey with a 'Bright commodities' sticker then it's all genuine.2. Neulife has a better system of verifying their ON Whey products. Every neulife ON Whey product has a unique code, QR code that you have to scan or SMS to neulife to verify it. I instantly got a message that "My ON whey is genuine". You can only verify it once though.3. The double rich chocolate flavor is awesome and when you mix it with water it forms a white creamy layer and taste if awesome exactly like double rich chocolate.4. If you are mixing one scoop with little water then it will the real chocolate taste with very very little bitterness exactly like a dark chocolate. It is sweet also. The bitterness is sometimes unnoticeable, this bitterness feels exactly the same on tongue after eating a dark chocolate.5. DRC flavor smells like chocolate and have tiny white in it.6. Comes with golden seal which is printed on the black label.Misconceptions:Some people say that they are getting fake supplements and half of the powder is fake. Some also say that the sellers cut the container from the bottom and remove the original powder and fill it with some fake powder. But I checked my container from inside after emptying it and found that the bottom is intact from inside and no sign of cutting the container was found. Please check attached images for clarification.But if you buy from neulife then there is no problem. Cloudtail India sells genuine ON whey as confirmed by Glanbia Performance Nutrition, but I can't say about the delivery agents. Buying supplements online are also not good in summers as these supplements need cool places to store while during transit the whey powder go though heat which may degrade its quality.If you are going to GYM then stay away from trainer's advice over this and never buy even if he gives you heavy discounts. This gym trainers will never give you the protein imported legally, they will either sell you grey market stuff which is mostly fake or they sell you supplements that are imported from unknown sources. Stay away from these fake trainers if you love your body.I was shocked to know that my GYM trainer doesn't know about neulife.So buy your protein from neulife or cloudtail only. Also stay away from low quality supplements like MuscleBlaze, don't get fooled in the name of made in India whey protein. ON is the best whey protein in the world. It is light on stomach and won't give you headaches or stomach pain. It is digested easily and helps in muscle building.Attached images for more info.

name: Ashish Prasad .com
title: Optimum Nutrition 100% Whey Gold Standard - One of the Best Whey Protein Blends
text:
--------------------------------------UPDATE 11 March 2016---------------------------------------I keep an eye on my reviews but lately, I have seen this happening often . I get a few votes up for a review  and then quite strangely  a down vote the same day, that really has left me wondering if some people are deliberately down voting reviews. I don't understand how Amazon moderators are letting this off.---------------------------------------------I am compelled to write this review after seeing quite a few negative reviews calling it a fake or counterfeit which I find it quite misleading once again. I bought the 1lb pack to check the concerns raised that the packaging is mislabeled with a 23gram protein scoop. To all the concerned people, there is in fact 1lb Gold Standard refill pack with 24g protein per scoop. (Photos attached)
Optimum Nutrition (ON) 100% Whey Gold Standard - 2 lbs (Double Rich Chocolate)
?is one of the best Whey proteins in the market today. Three things I liked about this product, the manufacturing is entirely done in the USA following strict US regulations, the grams of protein in each scoop and the taste.If you??e new to Protein Supplements, this is a quick overview of few major protein types that are sold in the market today.Most protein supplements that are in the market offer blends of different types of whey proteins. To make it easy, let me break it down for you. There are three types of fast digestive proteins, the cheapest is the Whey Concentrate typically a mass gainer with lots of carbs , then comes the more expensive Whey Isolate and then the most expensive Whey Hydro Isolate .Concentrate typically takes about 2-3 hours to digest, Isolates can be digested in your system within 2 hours, Hydro Isolates is purest form whey and can be taken even if you??e lactose intolerant - Hydro isolates can be digested within an hour and work best as Post Workout drinks. Basically, the price of your protein directly depends on the % of Whey Isolate or Whey Hydro Isolate present. There is also a slow digestive protein called Casein which is cheaper or almost the same as Whey Concentrate, treat this as a bedtime supplement as it takes about 6 hours to digest.What is OPTIMUM NUTRITION- 100% Whey Gold Standard ?ON 100% Whey Gold Standard is a multi-whey blend comprising isolates & concentrates as its main ingredients. It contains 24 grams of protein per serving, with a bit of fat, cholesterol, and lactose. Bear in mind, if you??e lactose intolerant, this is not for you unfortunately.Taste, Texture and MixabilityIt is not very sweet and mixes well with water and milk. I didn?? feel bloated and Double Chocolate flavour I??e tried was good, and I will give8.5/10 for the taste9.5/10 for mixabilityTotal score 9/10When will I start seeing results?This is the bitter truth, Protein supplements would help you <20% to reach your fitness goals. Your everyday workout helps you about another 30% and the rest is your daily diet as to how you maintain yourself eating healthy. You??e not going to get fitter staying home and just having 3 protein smoothies a day.From somewhere I had once read, you don?? buy protein protein supplements till you are regular at the gym working out and eating healthy for at least 90 days. Once those two habits are accomplished, buy protein supplements, and you will see results.Are protein supplements necessary?This question is debatable but it all comes down to how much protein is in your everyday diet. If you??e enough protein in your diet, no need obviously. From a personal perspective, I would avoid processed food like protein supplements any day, if I can consume enough protein through my diet (egg, milk, meat etc)Health Benefits/ IssuesIt is always advisable to take protein in their natural form (Milk, Egg, Meat, etc), but with a vegetarian diet that could be challenging. Rule of thumb with supplements is DO NOT go overboard - DO NOT take more than 2 scoops in 24 hours, but personally, if you??e not aiming for the Olympics, I suggest to start with 1 scoop a day so that you go easy on your body. In addition, you MUST drink a lot of water when taking protein supplements. From a lecture of Dr Tara Swart of MIT Sloan, your body requires 500ml of water for every 30lb (13.6 Kg) of your weight in a day to function normally.Smoothie recipe = 1 scoop (Chocolate) + 1 Avacado + Banana + 200ml Almond Milk + Ice Cubes in a Blender .PLEASE NOTE: Insufficient water intake can give you Stomach pain/ Abdominal Pain with protein supplements. NOT to be considered professional/medical advice. This review is based on personal experience. Protein supplements are to be considered with caution.

name: Prime Customer
title: Use common sense
text: You dont need supplements to build muscle.Because for body weight of 76kg you need nearly 150g of protein.And whey protein gives 24g for 1scoop so if 2lb is around Rs.3000 each scoop costs Rs.100 and you are still at deficit of neatly 135g.Chicken is even better a kilo costs Rs 130 and boneless breasts costs Rs. 200 and 100gm of the same costs Rs 20 and gives 31g of protein and 1gm fat. So having twice gives you 61gm of protein and costs Rs. 40 and with milk, eggs & oats, roti/chapati & rajma/channa/chole gives you full protein daily requirement all totalling under Rs. 100.So it makes no sense to buy supplements. Its like this as if you drinking horlicks makes you taller stronger and sharper and you've been drinking it since your childhood and you know the results.I am not saying taking supplements wont build muscles it does actually. But it makes no difference if you take chicken or egg or whey protein or milk. Protein is protein.All that matters is meeting your daily protein requirement of nealy 1.5 or 2gm of protein / kg of body weight and incase you are deficit in your daily requirement of say 25g you supplement it with supplements hence the name supplements ie you complete your deficit gap by supplementing it with shakes.And it makes no sense to make it as primary protein food and drink 6 scoops to meet such requirement spend Rs.10000 a month when normal food costs under Rs. 1500 and meets all your requirement.People in US usually take 2 scoops not because whey protein builds more muscle but because a pound of chicken or ~450g costs 6-8 dollars which can make up for 2 or 3 servings or one to one and half days so for a month it costs them considering $7 as average it costs $210. So in US whey protein is cheaper but in india chicken is cheaper.Its all consumerism they want you to buy so that they can make money.WRT preworkout creatine it makes no difference its just placebo effect. Ive used it for 2 years. Your strength grows naturally over time with or without creatine just eat proper normal food. And there is no better pre workout than a banana/rice
